thread.title: Kanye West Takes His Family To Visit His Mother's Gravesite
thread.title_full: Kanye West Takes His Family To Visit His Mother's Gravesite

author: D.L. Chandler
title: Kanye West Takes His Family To Visit His Mother's Gravesite
text:
3 
Los Angeles, CA – Kanye West and his family were seen touching down in their private jet Monday night (Jan. 2) in Los Angeles. West, his wife Kim Kardashian , and their two children, North and Saint, were all reportedly returning from visiting the gravesite of Kanye’s late mother, Donda West . 
According to a TMZ report, Dr. West, who passed in 2007, is buried in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. The outlet says that this visit was the first time West has taken his entire family to the grave. 
West’s closeness with his mother has been well documented via past songs, including his “ Only One ” single. Naming his creative content company DONDA and establishing the Donda’s House nonprofit organization further solidified that bond. 
Since being released from his recent hospital stay, West has been making more public appearances .
